item.description:
$9 Movie Tuesdays -$9 Movie Tuesdays - Iron Man 3(2013) -Please get tickets at 6:45PM. --Movie Start time 7PM.  We still meet at 6:45PM in Lobby to go in at 6:50PM to get good seats. Most seats are all new and very comfy!!

$9 Movie Tuesdays - Iron Man 3(2013): Details: Tony Stark uses his ingenuity to fight those who destroyed his private world and soon goes up against his most powerful enemy yet: the Mandarin. 

 

Staring: Robert Downey Jr., Guy Pearce and Gwyneth Paltrow

MPAA Rating R (for strong bloody violence throughout, and language)

Genres: Action | Adventure | Sci-Fi | Thriller

 

Run Time 2 hour 15 minutes

--------------------------------------------------

This looks like a great movie not to be missed on the Big Screen! So take a break from your work week and watch this great movie with us, some of your new pals. This movie looks great for 2012..... It’s time to see a great movie so do not miss out! You can't beat $7.50 for 3D.

Location: Showcase Cinemas Woburn 25 Middlesex Canal Parkway, Woburn, MA.

Meet in the lobby. Walk into the lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note there is one on the right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables. This is so we have an exact spot to meet.

Ciao Biagio

-------------------------------------------------------------

Note: There is a pre Movie dinner at Tudo Na Brasa 414 Main St Woburn, MA at 6 PM. Please do sign up for this dinner  seperately.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in lobby. Walk into lobby go to the left side ticket counter (Note: NOT the one on right so do not get confused) buy your ticket turn right walk 15 feet I will be sitting down at the small tables.
item.name: $7.50 Movie Tuesdays - Iron Man 3 (2013) NOT in 3D
